lead_paragraph: Swansea City manager Francesco Guidolin has been taken to a London hospital with a chest infection and will miss Wednesday's Premier League game at Arsenal.

headline.print_headline: Swansea Boss Guidolin Taken to Hospital Ahead of Match
headline.main: Swansea Boss Guidolin Taken to Hospital Ahead of Match

snippet: Swansea City manager Francesco Guidolin has been taken to a London hospital with a chest infection and will miss Wednesday's Premier League game at Arsenal....
